title: A Plan to be safe

abstract: 'When I looked up at the mountains, I saw the dark clouds.'
description: Carla Zekas and her family were spending a hot Summer's day by the river when the dark clouds first emerged. At that moment, the plan changed from staying cool to being safe.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001447; Living with disaster: stories and experiences from disasters; Active; 2009
